https://api.github.com/repos/mdo/code-gu.readme:
Code Guide

Standards for developing consistent, flexible, and sustainable HTML and CSS.
Start reading ☞

--- ## Setup Code Guide is built on Jekyll and hosted on GitHub Pages. To install Jekyll: ```sh gem install jekyll ``` To start the local server: ```sh jekyll serve ``` Open `localhost:4000` in your browser. ## License Released under MIT by, and copyright, @mdo. ## Translations Translations are maintained by their creators and may not always be up to date with the original here. -
